documents.document: I will not complain about the weather. I will not complain about the weather. Sorry, can't do it #WTF is the deal with this #summer #NZ ?

Today is a friendly reminder why I hate commuting

@gnawt @jeep well I don’t anymore. Not paying that extra tax for no reason…
So a new @Jeep GC costs almost 20k more in #NZ than in #AU What’s the deal with that? Does it cost an extra 20k to ship to #NZ or something?
Hmm, the internet here in Melbourne is like being in 2001. It's that slow I might as well hear the dial tone of a modem #firstworldproblems
@LFCWellington @5timesco dammit I go overseas for 4 weeks on that Saturday 🙁

Wow that was some hot #chrislynn straight out of the ground #BBL06
Heading to the @EtihadStadiumAU for my 1st #BigBashT20 game 🙂 should be good
Hmm, so red wine hot chocolate is a thing. I think I'm going to have to give it a go #somethingnew
Love using my iPad as a 2nd screen with @duetdisplay. Means I can always have2 screens wherever I am. #awesomeapp
Normally I would be saying "geez it's Dec already" but #2016 it's more like "thank god there's only a month to go of #2016"

Dear mother nature, I'm just curious if you are taking out your anger on the wrong nation? NZ had nothing to do with Trump being voted.
@shawnzekopitar very much so, though it would be nice if #nz stopped #shaking. Hope you're all good 😀
@shawnzekopitar sorry thought I replied earlier. Yes, we're all safe and sound. Was scary and there's constant aftershocks, but we're safe
@KloppGoff @SanFranNZ have a great night. Wish I could have made it 🙁

Yeah, we're all good. Been a long night with all the aftershocks, but we're all safe and sound thanks
